deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: Creator (content owner) who deployed this contract
billing period length in seconds (e.g., 30 days = 30*24*3600)
mapping of subscriber -> subscription expiry timestamp (unix)
accumulated ETH from subscriptions awaiting withdrawal by creator

_price price in wei for one billingPeriod
_billingPeriod length of billing period in seconds
Subscribe or renew for one billingPeriod. Must send exactly `price` wei.
Alias for subscribe  same behavior (semantic convenience)
Cancel subscription immediately. No refunds for remaining time.
Returns whether a given account currently has an active subscription
Seconds remaining for a subscriber (0 if expired)
Withdraw accumulated subscription funds to creator

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Direct deposits not allowed; call subscribe()"

documentation.text: Disallow direct ETH transfers to avoid accidental funds (force use of subscribe())

devdoc.details: Only creator can change price/billing period or withdraw accumulated funds.
devdoc.title: SubscriptionContract  simple ETH-based subscription manager

billingPeriod().notice: billing period length in seconds (e.g., 30 days = 30*24*3600)

cancel().notice: Cancel subscription immediately. No refunds for remaining time.

constructor.notice: _price price in wei for one billingPeriod _billingPeriod length of billing period in seconds

creator().notice: Creator (content owner) who deployed this contract

expiry(address).notice: mapping of subscriber -> subscription expiry timestamp (unix)

isActive(address).notice: Returns whether a given account currently has an active subscription

renew().notice: Alias for subscribe  same behavior (semantic convenience)

secondsRemaining(address).notice: Seconds remaining for a subscriber (0 if expired)

subscribe().notice: Subscribe or renew for one billingPeriod. Must send exactly `price` wei.

withdraw().notice: Withdraw accumulated subscription funds to creator

userdoc.notice: Deployed by a Creator who defines price & billing period. Subscribers pay ETH to subscribe/renew.
